name: PoC POAP
description: This quest allows you to claim a Proof of Competence early adopter POAP. Thank you for being here!

tasks.name: Have a wallet address
tasks.description: You need a wallet address to enter Web3 universe.

tasks.name: ENS
tasks.description: Register your unique ENS name at https://app.ens.domains/.

tasks.name: BrightID
tasks.description: BrightID https://www.brightid.org/ is a social identity network that allows you to prove that you're only using one account.

tasks.name: Proof of Humanity
tasks.description: Register yourself and get vouched by an existing member of the PoH community at https://www.proofofhumanity.id/

tasks.name: Self.ID
tasks.description: Create a Self.ID profile at https://self.id/ and connect at least 1 social connection to your profile.
